name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Burlington

likes.liked: — The little extras....full kitchen, room layout, staff, breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Good service

likes.disliked: — curtain do not close - light room in am

reviews.title: Would stay again! Very clean and well appointed!

aka: Homewood Suites By Hilton Burlington Hotel Burlington
description: Located in beautiful Burlington, Ontario our hotel provides 83 upscale, residential style, fully equipped suites. Each suite has a full kitchen with two burner stove top, refrigerator, and microwave. Enjoy your spacious suite with separate living area and bedroom. Take advantage of our complimentary internet access, complimentary Suite Start full hot breakfast daily, and Welcome Home Reception Monday through Thursday. Homewood Suites by Hilton Burlington is Burlington's finest all-suite hotel!
